name: electro-load
description:
electro-load

Dodge the falling wrenches and keep all the terminals on for as long as you can!
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 100.

Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement
X - Jump
C - Interact with lever
Enter - Pause
H - Hide Background

Tools/Assets

Engine - ct.js
Font - Press Start by codeman38
Image Editors - Piskel, Paint.NET, MS Paint
